content:
The Rain100H dataset is another benchmark dataset for image rain removal, which consists of 100 high-quality pairs of rainy and corresponding clean images. You can download the Rain100H dataset by following these steps:

1. Go to the official website of the Rain100H dataset: <http://www.icst.pku.edu.cn/struct/Projects/joint_rain_removal.html>
2. Scroll down to the "Download" section and click on the link "Rain100H.zip" to download the dataset.
3. Extract the downloaded zip file to a local folder.
4. You can now access the dataset, which contains two folders: "rainy\_image" and "ground\_truth". The "rainy\_image" folder contains 100 rainy images, and the "ground\_truth" folder contains their corresponding clean images.

Note that the Rain100H dataset is for research purposes only, and you should cite the original paper if you use the dataset in your research.
